DOC.brief_summary: Endoscopic treatment benign biliary stricture challenge . Balloon dilation and/or plastic stent placement currently popular technique . Partially cover self-expandable metallic stent also show effective difficult remove . A novel fully cover metallic stent recently develop . The aim study prospectively evaluate placement fully cover self-expandable metallic stent ( FCSEMS ) setting .
DOC.brief_title: Fully Covered Self-expandable Metal Stents ( FCMS ) Benign Biliary Strictures
DOC.detailed_description: After inclusion , endoscopic procedure ( ERCP ) perform patient order place FCMS across benign biliary stricture . The FCMS leave place 6 month extract second ERCP procedure . An opacification perform assess efficacy stenting . Patients follow one year FCMS extraction .
